document.discussion_title: Morning pictures of Somnath Mandir on 3rd Somvar of Shravan today
document.topic_text: Morning pictures of Somnath Mandir on 3rd Somvar of Shravan today August 22, 2016 Faith Gujarat Religious Saurastra Tourism Somnath: Presented here are morning pictures of Shri Somnath Mandir on 3rd Somvar of holy month of Shravan today. During the day, the Shivling will be decorated in various ways including with loads of Rudraksh. Somnath is first among 12 Jyotirlingas. It is one of two Jyotirlingas in Gujarat. The other is Nageshwar near Dwarka.
